data.actual_result: Unread channels section will be shown but is empty.
data.expected_result: Unread channels shouldn't be shown or should show the channel where you got mentioned.
data.short_description: Empty unread channels section shown for Quick Switcher when getting mentioned
data.steps_to_repro: - Get mentioned in any server - Make sure there are no other unread channels in this server - Open the server where you got mentioned - Also make sure the channel where you got mentioned isn't your last channel - Open the Quick Switcher - Observe the unread channel section there
